definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[חָשַׂף]] Is 52:10, [[חֲשָׂפָהּ]] Joe 1:7, [[חָשַׂפְתִּי]] Je 13:26, Je 49:10; Impf. [[וַיֶּחֱשׂף]] Ps 29:9; Imv. fs. [[חֶשְׂפִּי־]] Is 47:2; Inf. abs. [[חָשׂף]] Joe 1:7; cstr. [[לַחְשׂף]] Is 30:14, Hag 2:16; Pt. pass. [[חֲשׂוּפָה]] Ez Eze 4:7, [[חֲשׂוּפַי]] Is 20:4 (pl. cstr. ? cf. infr.).—
strip off, expose oneself by removing (obj. [[שׁׂבֶל]], flowing skirt, train) Is 47:2 of Babylon, personified as queen (‖[[גַּלִּי שׁוֹק]]), [[שׁוּלַיִח עַל־פָּנַיִח]] ´[[ח]] Je 13:26.

strip, lay bare, fig. of ´[[י]] Is 52:10 obj. [[זְרוֹעַ קדשׁו]]; of prophet, Ez Eze 4:7 (but Co del. v. as interpol.); obj. pers. Je 49:10 (‖[[גִּלֵּיתִי]]); [[חָשׂף חשׂפהּ]] Joe 1:7 of locusts stripping fig-tree; [[חֲשׂוּפַי שֵׁת]] Is 20:4 (pt. either sg. coll., with formative ending [[י]]—[[ַ]], De Lag:Se i. 19 (cf. 69), BN 192; or pl. cstr., v. Ges:§ 87, 1 c.); [[יְעָרוֹת]] ´[[ח]] Ps 29:9 of voice of ´[[י]] (i.e. a storm) stripping forests.
draw (water) Is 30:14; (wine) Hag 2:16; properly take from the surface, skim.
